title: [Large-scale] Integrated Dental Curriculum: Enhancing Clinical Competencies via Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic dental theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Online intensive course integrating theory and clinical skills through learner-led problem-solving activities

learning_goals: Learners will perform the core steps of the dental caries diagnostic protocol (examination, image analysis, patient record evaluation) with 80% accuracy through PBL scenarios.
Learners can present an integrated approach linking patient-specific risk factors and preventive strategies in over 70% of cases when designing dental prevention programs.
Learners can construct feedback loops with peers/instructors using online collaboration tools and improve problem-solving processes at least three times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
